message: Let's start fair. I take 90% and you get 10%.
You took 90% last round, now it's my turn to take a big share!
Let's compromise.  I'll take 60% and you can have 40%.  This is a good deal for both of us.  If we keep going back and forth, we'll both lose more money.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think I deserve a bit more for taking the risk of this negotiation
